table.name: logs_ip_actions
table.Comment: Used to log ips of individual actions

table.name: rbac_default_permissions
table.Comment: Default permission to assign to different account security l

table.name: updates
table.Comment: List of all applied updates in this database.

table.name: updates_include
table.Comment: List of directories where we want to include sql updates.

column.name: comment
column.Comment: Allows users to add a comment

column.name: name
column.Comment: filename with extension of the update.

column.name: hash
column.Comment: sha1 hash of the sql file.

column.name: state
column.Comment: defines if an update is released or archived.

column.name: timestamp
column.Comment: timestamp when the query was applied.

column.name: speed
column.Comment: time the query takes to apply in ms.

column.name: path
column.Comment: directory to include. $ means relative to the source directory.

column.name: state
column.Comment: defines if the directory contains released or archived updates.
